entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 04:32 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -15.9°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
